original_text: They also brought 220 of the temple servants—a body that David and the officials had established to assist the Levites. All were registered by name.
korean_text: 다윗과 방백들이 레위 사람들을 섬기라고 준 느디님 사람 중 성전 일꾼은 이백이십 명이었는데 그들은 모두 지명 받은 이들이었더라

sentences.original_text: They also brought 220 of the temple servants
a body that David and the officials had established
